structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: An authority shall be responsible for over-all planning of mass transit in its transit area. An authority must consult, cooperate and coordinate with any other state, local or federal planning agency or department, having responsibilities and/or authority in the same transit area according to federal and state laws. The ultimate goal of such planning shall be improvement of mass transit service. In carrying out its purposes, the authority shall consider its highway, road and street systems on federal, state and local levels.
